mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recipestandard(standard_id, recipe_id, material_id, recipe_product_quantity, quantity_units, usephase) VALUES(recipestandard_seq.nextval, #{recipeStandardList.recipe_Id}, #{recipeStandardList.material_Id}, #{recipeStandardList.recipe_Product_Quantity}, #{recipeStandardList.quantity_Units}, #{recipeStandardList.usePhase})
